channel.title: Auron's Masamune [Final Fantasy X Celestial Weapon]
channel.description:
Alright I tried my hand at modelling, I'm not very good as you can see.
Please note this is my FIRST EVER model. I have ZERO experience at modeling. But I pick things up very well. I used SilentCJ's two videos (the Sword and the Glaive) as reference on everything I've done to this model.
No I will not do ints. No I will not make this for clients. If you want this in your client, I'll give you the .mqo file via PM and you can do it yourself.
Personally, I'm in love with how it turned out, being my first model and all.
Here is what the sword really looks like [IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg159/Ituharu_Yamada/draft_lens2096041module10735576phot.jpg[/img]
Developing the Sword: [IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg159/Ituharu_Yamada/masamune-1.jpg[/img]
MODEL: [IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg159/Ituharu_Yamada/AuronPerpsViewITUHARU.png[/img]
Side View: [IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg159/Ituharu_Yamada/AuronSideViewITUHARU.png[/img]
Wireframe: [IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg159/Ituharu_Yamada/WireFrameAuronSideView.png[/img]
Rate/Hate 1 - 10 it please.
LilXCJ
------------------- Due to constant accusations of me using Dylan's Model, here is his. Blender Version [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/Masa1.jpg[/img] + The topic of his older version (non-Blender) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327660.0.html

item.title: Auron's Masamune [Final Fantasy X Celestial Weapon]
item.dc:creator: @Acans Acans
item.description:
@Acans wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:14, topic:320879”]Flamers/haters…

95% of the Moparscape community.[/quote]

Now thats a sad fact…

[quote=“the elve age, post:11, topic:320879”]This IS DYLAN’S MODEL. I used this on my server, as he model’s for me.

Way to leech and recolor

Rep++ (sarcasm)[/quote]

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:19, topic:320879”]Its in NO way my model. theres many differences. look at the detail differences aswell as the mesh structure differences. Hell, even the blade shape has its differences. You guys should look into these qualities before accusing someone. Also, that topic link only shows V1, not V2 (which is unreleased).

On topic:
the models OK at best. look at the disturbingly ugly wireframe… the face structure is terrible, how someone confused this for my model confuses me. its not a horrible model, as you are a beginner, but the structure is in no way ‘clean’ (which is important, believe it or not).[/quote]

Put in his place.

Great work Corey, seeing as this is your first model.

Read full topic
item.source: Auron's Masamune [Final Fantasy X Celestial Weapon]

item.title: Auron's Masamune [Final Fantasy X Celestial Weapon]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Its in NO way my model. theres many differences. look at the detail differences aswell as the mesh structure differences. Hell, even the blade shape has its differences. You guys should look into these qualities before accusing someone. Also, that topic link only shows V1, not V2 (which is unreleased).

On topic:
the models OK at best. look at the disturbingly ugly wireframe… the face structure is terrible, how someone confused this for my model confuses me. its not a horrible model, as you are a beginner, but the structure is in no way ‘clean’ (which is important, believe it or not).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Alright I tried my hand at modelling, I’m not very good as you can see.

Please note this is my FIRST EVER model. I have ZERO experience at modeling. But I pick things up very well. I used SilentCJ’s two videos (the Sword and the Glaive) as reference on everything I’ve done to this model.

No I will not do ints.
No I will not make this for clients.
If you want this in your client, I’ll give you the .mqo file via PM and you can do it yourself.

Personally, I’m in love with how it turned out, being my first model and all.

Here is what the sword really looks like

Developing the Sword:

masamune-1.jpg1022×477

MODEL:

Side View:

Wireframe:

WireFrameAuronSideView.png723×650

Rate/Hate
1 - 10 it please.

LilXCJ

Due to constant accusations of me using Dylan’s Model, here is his.
Blender Version

Masa1.jpg800×600

  • The topic of his older version (non-Blender)
    http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327660.0.html
